headline: MarketAxess to Host Conference Call Announcing Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results on Wednesday, August 6, 2025
summary: NEW YORK, July 17, 2025--MarketAxess Holdings Inc. (Nasdaq: MKTX) the operator of a leading electronic trading platform for fixed-income securities, will issue a press release announcing its second quarter 2025 financial results on Wednesday, August 6, 2025, before the market opens. Chris Concannon, Chief Executive Officer, and Ilene Fiszel Bieler, Chief Financial Officer, will host a conference call to provide a strategic update and discuss the Company’s financial results and outlook on Wednesd
